Aug. 19, 1939 D Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship)
Bridgwater Band Festival (Open Championship) 10 Test Piece Contest Bridgwater Band Festival bridgwater-band-festival-open-championship
Own Choice from a Specified List
The Talisman [Balfe, unknown arranger]
Blake Gardens, Bridgwater, Somerset, England, UK Prizes - 1st £20 and shield, 2nd £14, 3rd £9, 4th £5. March contest - 1st Glastonbury, 2nd Cardiff Corporation, 3rd Bridgwater Christy. 8 bands competed.
